events.message: Customer reported an accident involving their vehicle colliding with a tree on April 30th, requesting to file a claim for damages sustained.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords such as vehicle collision and accident mentioned in the report.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to the customer to assist with the claim process and coordinate next steps efficiently.
Formal acknowledgement of claim receipt was sent to the customer, confirming the start of the claim processing for their auto accident.
Customer was requested to provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimate documents to support the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including the police report and damage photos within the given timeframe.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and vehicle condition to verify claim details and assess liability.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident was caused by loss of control, with no third-party involvement identified.
A settlement offer was proposed, covering the estimated repair costs of the vehicle and associated claim expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the quick resolution and clear communication throughout the claims process.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance panel following positive feedback and completed investigation.
Insurance payment was issued to the customer, reimbursing the approved amount for vehicle repairs in a timely manner.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that all payments were completed and the customer had no further issues.
All claim documentation and investigation reports were archived according to company record-keeping policies.
